### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron plate production at position (40, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (40, -82)) with iron-plate output
-  Furnace (position (45, -83)) with iron-plate output
-  Furnace (position (42, -81)) with no output
-  Furnace (position (45, -80)) with iron-plate output and copper-ore input
-  Furnace (position (40, -79)) with no output
-  Chest (position (43.5, -82.5)) storing coal and iron-plate
-  Chest (position (43.5, -81.5)) storing coal and iron-plate
### Copper ore mining at position (43, -84)
Consists of following entities
-  BurnerMiningDrill (position (43, -84)) with no fuel

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity
### Errors when placing entities on the map
-  Make sure you have the entity in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map
### Errors when crafting items
-  Ensure you have all the required sub-ingredients and a crafting machine or furnace before attempting to craft an item
### Errors when smelting items
-  Define a function to smelt items instead of using an undefined function name
### Errors when checking furnace results
-  Ensure the furnace has enough output before attempting to assert its result
### Errors when fueling entities
-  Ensure you have enough fuel in your inventory before attempting to fuel an entity
### Errors when using entity functions
-  Define the required functions or use the correct function names to avoid NameError exceptions
